tool_description: An API to show the latest Brexit news around the world
name: Brexit Live
title: Brexit Live

api_list.name: Get Individual news Source news
api_list.description: Get Brexit news from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brexit-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brexit-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://brexit-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brexit-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Brexit news
api_list.description: This endpoint return all news about Brexit
